name: @shinsenter/defer.js
title: defer.js
description: ðŸ¥‡ A super small, super efficient library that helps you lazy load everything like images, video, audio, iframes as well as stylesheets, and JavaScript.

scripts.tools: npm -g install jsdoc-to-markdown eslint js-beautify uglify-js
scripts.readme: rm -f ./docs/index.md && jsdoc2md --separators -l html -g grouped ./src/*.js > ./docs/apis.md && cat ./docs/*.md > README.md && cp -p README.md ./docs/index.md
scripts.pull: npm run cleanup && npm run tools && npm i && npm up && npm audit fix
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run s1 && npm run s2 && npm run s3 && npm run readme
scripts.versionup: npm run lint && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch -m 'Ready to publish version %s'
scripts.upload: npm run pull && npm run build && npm prune --prod && npm publish --access=public
